channel.title: Productivity on Bogdan Penkovsky, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Bogdan Penkovsky, PhD

item.title: 5/25 Rule
item.description: The method was popularized by Warren Buffett. Write down 25 goals you want to achieve in the next few years. How about career, family, health or personal development? It is the best to pick a quiet place and dedicate some time to this exercise. Take your time to write all 25 goals. Should you continue later, the entries will be waiting for you on this page.

item.title: How To Be More Productive
item.description: Many articles have been written on the topic. And yet I am writing another one, as a reminder.
